```{r prevalent_incident_cases}
 
# t0<- stroke_tbl %>% gather(key, value, -c(f.eid, Stroke_Status)) %>% 
#                              mutate(date= str_sub(value, 1, 10) %>% ymd())

t0<- pericardial_tbl %>% gather(key, value, -c(f.eid, pericard_status)) %>% 
                             mutate(date= str_sub(value, 1, 10) %>% lubridate::ymd())

t0 <- t0 %>% select(f.eid, pericard_status, date)

t1 <- t0 %>% group_by(f.eid, pericard_status) %>% summarise(minDate= min(date))
t1$minDate <- ymd(t1$minDate)

t1                                  

View(t1)

temp_df <- sample_df %>% select(f.eid, recruitment_date) 
temp_df$recruitment_date <- ymd(temp_df$recruitment_date)

t2 <- full_join(temp_df, t1)
# t2 %>% filter(minDate <= recruitment_date)

t3 <- t2 %>% mutate(prevalent_status = ifelse(minDate <= recruitment_date,1,0),
              incident_status = ifelse(minDate > recruitment_date, 1, 0))
t3$prevalent_status <- replace(t3$prevalent_status,is.na(t3$prevalent_status),0)
t3$incident_status <- replace(t3$incident_status,is.na(t3$incident_status),0)

head(t3)

t3 %>% dplyr::filter(prevalent_status >1)

sum(t3$prevalent_status)
sum(t3$incident_status)
```
